mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.yonghu_id as yonghuId ,a.yisheng_id as yishengId ,a.yibao_name as yibaoName ,a.yibao_types as yibaoTypes ,a.yibao_uuid_number as yibaoUuidNumber ,a.yibao_photo as yibaoPhoto ,a.yibao_content as yibaoContent ,a.yibao_delete as yibaoDelete ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
,yisheng.yisheng_name as yishengName ,yisheng.yisheng_phone as yishengPhone ,yisheng.yisheng_id_number as yishengIdNumber ,yisheng.yisheng_photo as yishengPhoto ,yisheng.yisheng_email as yishengEmail ,yonghu.yonghu_name as yonghuName ,yonghu.yonghu_phone as yonghuPhone ,yonghu.yonghu_id_number as yonghuIdNumber ,yonghu.yonghu_photo as yonghuPhoto ,yonghu.yonghu_email as yonghuEmail
FROM yibao a left JOIN yisheng yisheng ON a.yisheng_id = yisheng.id left JOIN yonghu yonghu ON a.yonghu_id = yonghu.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and ( a.yonghu_id = #{params.yonghuId} )
and ( a.yisheng_id = #{params.yishengId} )
and a.yibao_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yibaoName},'%')
and a.yibao_types = #{params.yibaoTypes}
and a.yibao_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yibaoUuidNumber},'%')
and a.yibao_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.yibaoContent},'%')
and a.yibao_delete >= #{params.yibaoDeleteStart}
and a.yibao_delete <= #{params.yibaoDeleteEnd}
and a.yibao_delete = #{params.yibaoDelete}
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.yisheng_id IS NOT NULL
and yisheng.yisheng_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yishengName},'%')
and yisheng.yisheng_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yishengPhone},'%')
and yisheng.yisheng_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yishengIdNumber},'%')
and yisheng.yisheng_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.yishengEmail},'%')
and a.yonghu_id IS NOT NULL
and yonghu.yonghu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuName},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuPhone},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuIdNumber},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuEmail},'%')
order by a.${params.sort} ${params.order}
